comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: Father I pray the blood of Jesus on all eyes seeing and ears hearing this to know without a doubt this is the man You raised up to make our country safe and great again!!! In Jesus name amen

replies.author: Brendon
replies.text: Do you want some Freedom French toast? Grab America by the freedom If you want another War vote for a Republican they're really good at starting Wars Don't forget to be at teabagging hypocrite vote Trump The funniest thing is Donald Trump was a lifelong liberal until he tried to get votes from you teabaggers Yeah just keep looking for that pussy draft Dodger Donald Trump just like you voted for George W bush the big old pussy draft Dodger that sent 4440 of our American troops have died in Iraq that's a great idea yeah don't forget the throwing Ted Nugent s*** in his pants so he didn't have to go to Vietnam also don't forget Donald draft Dodger also Hillary has bigger hands than Donald Trump

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Yes it's true Donald Trump accepted the Lord a few months ago. He is a new Christian being formed and molded. I have seen a change in him but yet he is still a man and will not be perfect. But Trump stands for life and will fight for all Americans even the unborn. You can not say that about Hilary Clinton...
